member_organisations:
Its members include both companies and associations: British American Tobacco (Holdings) Ltd., Imperial Tobacco Ltd., Japan Tobacco International S.A., Philip Morris International Management S.A., European Cigar Manufacturers Association, European Smoking Tobacco Association, Groupement des Industries Europeennes du Tabac. 
The Confederation of European Community Cigarette Manufactuerers (CECCM) is an observer member.
fields_of_interest: Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Public Health
head_office_address: c/o Mayer Brown 52 Avenue des Arts
eu_initiatives:
Implementation of REACH regulation with regard to the Tobacco Industry.  
If and when appropriate, the TIP represents the members' views to the European Institutions.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: TIP does not belong to any association.
goals__remit: The objective of the TIP is to facilitate compliance with REACH and related EU legislation by TIP members in full compliance with EU competition law.
